items.headline: Four times in 22 minutes, Bessent says there’s ‘hysteria’ over Greenland tariff threat
items.summary_en: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said the reaction to President Donald Trump’s threat to enact tariffs over Greenland is like the “hysteria” that greeted the president’s earlier tariffs in April.

items.headline: ‘People are often unreasonable when money is involved’: My husband, 62, gave me a 5-year life estate. Would I have to pay for a new roof?
items.summary_en: “He has included a provision stating that I would be responsible for ‘maintenance and expenses’ during my occupancy.”

items.headline: Actress Aubrey Plaza puts L.A. home back on the market for discounted price of $5.75 million

items.headline: Tennis star Tommy Paul and fiancee Paige Lorenze both list multi-million-dollar properties after buying ‘dream forever home’

items.headline: One Wall Street bank wastes no time downgrading Europe over Greenland threat
items.summary_en: Consensus expectations for European market EPS growth had been around 10% prior to this weekend. Now Citi thinks 8% more likely but risks are tilted to the downside.

items.headline: Natural-gas futures are jumping 20%. It will be toughest test in a decade, one analyst says.

items.headline: Stock futures slump as U.S.-Europe trade tensions ramp up over Trump’s Greenland demands
